recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices then grill or sear.
Combine chicken with sauce and simmer.
Finish with cream and garnish with cilantro.
